desktop"> <div class="product-accordion-detail product-description"> <h3 class="description-title"> Description </h3> <div class="content description-custom-content"> Pamper yourself with Factory Buys Euro Top Mattress that will give you a soothing sleep night after night.<br><br>Incorporating the cutting-edge technology, the lavish construction addresses all elements that will offer you a comfortable and luxurious experience - Euro top padding with high-density foam and an independent coil system - made to provide you with an undisturbed sleep all night long.<br><br><h4>Terms and conditions of Free Shipping Promotions</h4> The free shipping promotion excludes some postcodes. <br><br>Where a postcode exclusion applies, the item will be undeliverable and the sale will be fully excluded from the free shipping campaign. Normal T&s and C&s will apply in this case. <br><br>Additional freight charges will apply to postcode exclusion orders. We will contact you and advise of any additional charges. You are entitled to cancel the order if additional charges apply. <br><br>For any further information, please contact our admin team on <a data-fr-linked="true" href="mailto:info@factorybuys.com.au">info@factorybuys.com.au</a> and attention your email to the management team. </div> </div> <div class="product-accordion-detail product-features"> <h3 class="features-title"> Product Features </h3> <div class="content features-content"> Plush Euro Top padding<br> 5 zoned pocket springs - Different levels of support<br> Independent coil system - Excellent support and sublime comfort<br> 6 working turn coil system<br> High-density foam<br> Medium firmness<br> Hypo-allergic material<br> Luxury knitted jacquard fabric<br> Side handles for positioning<br> Vacuum packaging: The item will expand to its normal shape within 1 day after unpacking<br> Care Instructions<br> Do not machine wash<br> Do not bleach<br> Do not iron<br> Do not dry clean<br> Do not saturate with water or other cleaning liquids<br> Treat spills with a cloth and dry with a blow dryer<br> It May be spot cleaned with water or soap<br> Rotate mattress regularly<br> Vacuum using low suction<br> </div> </div> <div class="product-accordion-detail product-dimensions-specs"> <h3 class="dimensions-specs-title"> Dimensions & Specs </h3> <div class="content window.BOOMR.renderRegion = "gcp-europe-west1"; window.BOOMR.url = "https://dunlin.com.au/cdn/shopifycloud/boomerang/shopify-boomerang-1.0.0.min.js"; var where = document.currentScript || document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; var parentNode = where.parentNode; var promoted = false; var LOADER_TIMEOUT = 3000; function promote() { if (promoted) { return; } var script = document.createElement("script"); script.id = "boomr-scr-as"; script.src = window.BOOMR.url; script.async = true; parentNode.appendChild(script); promoted = true; } function iframeLoader(wasFallback) { promoted = true; var dom, bootstrap, iframe, iframeStyle; var doc = document; var win = window; window.BOOMR.snippetMethod = wasFallback ? "if" : "i"; bootstrap = function(parent, scriptId) { var script = doc.createElement("script"); script.id = scriptId || "boomr-if-as"; script.src = window.BOOMR.url; BOOMR_lstart = new Date().getTime(); parent = parent || doc.body; parent.appendChild(script); }; if (!window.addEventListener && window.attachEvent && navigator.userAgent.match(/MSIE [67]./)) { window.BOOMR.snippetMethod = "s"; bootstrap(parentNode, "boomr-async"); return; } iframe = document.createElement("IFRAME"); iframe.src = "about:blank"; iframe.title = ""; iframe.role = "presentation"; iframe.loading = "eager"; iframeStyle = (iframe.frameElement || iframe).style; iframeStyle.width = 0; iframeStyle.height = 0; iframeStyle.border = 0; iframeStyle.display = "none"; parentNode.appendChild(iframe); try { win = iframe.contentWindow; doc = win.document.open(); } catch (e) { dom = document.domain; iframe.src = "javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='" + dom + "';void(0);"; win = iframe.contentWindow; doc = win.document.open(); } if (dom) { doc._boomrl = function() { this.domain = dom; bootstrap(); }; doc.write("<body onload='document._boomrl();'>"); } else { win._boomrl = function() { bootstrap(); }; if (win.addEventListener) { win.addEventListener("load", win._boomrl, false); } else if (win.attachEvent) { win.attachEvent("onload", win._boomrl); } } doc.close(); } var link = document.createElement("link"); if (link.relList && typeof link.relList.supports === "function" && link.relList.supports("preload") && ("as" in link)) { window.BOOMR.snippetMethod = "p"; link.href = window.BOOMR.url; link.rel = "preload"; link.as = "script"; link.addEventListener("load", promote); link.addEventListener("error", function() { iframeLoader(true); }); setTimeout(function() { if (!promoted) { iframeLoader(true); } }, LOADER_TIMEOUT); BOOMR_lstart = new Date().getTime(); parentNode.appendChild(link); } else { iframeLoader(false); } function boomerangSaveLoadTime(e) { window.BOOMR_onload = (e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime(); } if (window.addEventListener) { window.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false); } else if (window.attachEvent) { window.attachEvent("onload", boomerangSaveLoadTime); } if (document.addEventListener) { document.addEventListener("onBoomerangLoaded", class="product-description rte rte--column" > <div class="tabs-wrapper"> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p>Handmade by Beadlight in the UK, the Cirrus collection was originally designed for use in private jet aircraft, and first and business class cabins. The range has proved incredibly successful in hotels, private residences and mega yachts. Built to the exacting standards demanded by the aeropsace industry, each Beadlight reading light is made by hand and wrapped in English leather with hand stitching. </p> <p> </p> <p>- Ideal as a bedhead light, the luxurious fitting provides two brightness settings for reading. </p> <p>- Can be mounted to existing walls and bed heads.</p> <p>- Simple installation is required by an electrician.</p> <p>- Energy Efficient. These LED lights become the perfect solution to make substantial energy savings.</p> <p>- The wall lights use 1.4 watts of energy and require a 12v transformer, not included.</p> <p>- Previously available only to architects and interior designers, the Beadlight collection is now available to the public exclusively through Dunlin.</p> <ul> <li>Overall Length from wall 45cm</li> </ul> <p>Lead time</p> <h6>Expect 8-12 weeks for Delivery</h6> <p>- <a rel="noopener noreferrer" title="Beadlight buy online" href="https://static1.squarespace.com/static/58948e8a20099ef598f32cd4/t/5bd6e1e4419202dce2775d20/1540809189455/Cirrus+Escutcheon.pdf" data-mce-href="https://static1.squarespace.com/static/58948e8a20099ef598f32cd4/t/5bd6e1e4419202dce2775d20/1540809189455/Cirrus+Escutcheon.pdf" target="_blank">Technical PDF</a></p> </div></div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <!-- Boilerplate root element of PhotoSwipe Zoom. snippet: easyslider-product --> <div class="easyslider-text"><p> </p> <p> </p> <p>Handmade by Beadlight in the UK, the Cirrus collection was originally designed for use in private jet aircraft, and first and business class cabins. The range has proved incredibly successful in hotels, private residences and mega yachts. Built to the exacting standards demanded by the aeropsace industry, each Beadlight reading light is made by hand and wrapped in English leather with hand stitching. </p> <p> </p> <p>- Ideal as a bedhead light, the luxurious fitting provides two brightness settings for reading. </p> <p>- Can be mounted to existing walls and bed heads.</p> <p>- Simple installation is required by an electrician.</p> <p>- Energy Efficient. These LED lights become the perfect solution to make substantial energy savings.</p> <p>- The wall lights use 1.4 watts of energy and require a 12v transformer, not included.</p> <p>- Previously available only to architects and interior designers, the Beadlight collection is now available to the public exclusively through Dunlin.</p> <ul> <li>Overall Length from wall 45cm</li> </ul> <p>Lead What you think fits best will ultimately depend on your personal style and preferences.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eLuckily, The Moderns online catalogue has the best living room furniture that will inspire you to beautify your living room.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003ch2\u003eSo, Does Living Room Furniture Have to Match?\u003c\/h2\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eNo, not at all. There are many ways to make your living room pleasing to the eye. You can have a cohesive common area, with and without matching all your furniture.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eHere are some ways to make your space pop:\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cp\u003e\u003cb\u003eAll-matching\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\n \u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf this is the route you decide to take, here are some guidelines to follow:\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cul\u003e\n \u003cli\u003e\u003cb\u003eGet a matching set.\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eSofter lounge room furniture such as \u003ca href=\"https:\/\/themodern.com.au\/pages\/sofas\"\u003esofas\u003c\/a\u003e, chairs and loveseats should be purchased in the same colour from the same line and retailer. If you cant find a matching set, choose a piece that looks closely similar to the others.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eContact us today if you want to know more about our ottomans or footstools or just need help picking the perfect one.\u003c\/p\u003e \n \u003cli\u003e\u003cb\u003eStick to a colour scheme.\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eTo avoid making your common area look bland and monotonous, throw in some accent pieces. They give that subtle hint of contrast that enlivens your modern living room furniture. For example, white accents would make your setting look put-together if you have a grey couch.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cli\u003e\u003cb\u003eChoose the same wood finish.\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eWhether you want a \u003ca href=\"https:\/\/themodern.com.au\/collections\/coffee-tables-side-tables\"\u003ecoffee table\u003c\/a\u003e as a centrepiece or some \u003ca href=\"https:\/\/themodern.com.au\/collections\/home-office-storage-furniture\"\u003ehome office storage furniture\u003c\/a\u003e in your lounge area, make sure they have the same finish and polish. Just like with sofas, you can also find matching sets. But if not, explore other living room furniture options and find a wood finish that goes with your theme.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003c\/ul\u003e\n \u003cp\u003e\u003cb\u003eMix and match\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eHere are some tips to keep in mind to let your creativity flow in mixing and matching:\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cul\u003e\n \u003cli\u003e\u003cb\u003ePick a colour palette.\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eFollowing a colour scheme will help guide your choices so everything blends nicely. You can start by choosing several neutral colours and adding a few brighter ones to the mix. Researching different colour schemes is also a good place to start.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cli\u003e\u003cb\u003ePlay around with modern and contemporary styles.\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eLetting these two styles meet gives your space a sense of harmony and balance. Keep your lounge room furniture simple and put a unique spin to it with modern accents.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cli\u003e\u003cb\u003eAdd textures and patterns.\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eYou can always start small by switching the plain pillow covers to those with funky patterns or textures. Its an excellent way to introduce something different into your layout.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003c\/ul\u003e\n \u003cp\u003e\u003cb\u003eNon-matching\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eLet loose and let your personality shine through non-matching living room furniture. This may be tricky, so you must be intentional to avoid going overboard and looking scattered. You can achieve that tight-knit look by following a colour scheme and choosing one to two textures and patterns consistent with your theme.\u003c\/p\u003e\n \u003ch2\u003eBuy Living Room Furniture from The Modern Australia\u003c\/h2\u003e\n \u003cp\u003eThe Modern is home to a wide range of contemporary and modern Scandinavian-designed furniture that will elevate your homes interior. It is also moisture-resistant, versatile, sustainable, abundant and durable.\u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\n\u003cstrong\u003eAsh. \u003c\/strong\u003eAsh is a light-coloured, smooth-grained hardwood known for taking stains and most finishing products well. Its also beautiful, lightweight, bendable, strong and shock-resistant.\u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\n\u003cstrong\u003eBeech. \u003c\/strong\u003eThis fine-grained, odourless wood has an interesting light orange to salmon colour. It is a tough solid wood yet bendable, and it ages gracefully. Its so versatile that it can be used for making large furniture pieces and delicate items, including spoons.\u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\n\u003cstrong\u003eElm. \u003c\/strong\u003eThis hardwood has distinct light and dark sections and can range from light to dark brown in colour. It is odourless, bendable, durable and resistant to decay. However, elm use is now discontinued because of Dutch elm disease, which has rendered this species rare and hard to find. \u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003c\/ul\u003e\n\u003ch4\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e WHERE ARE YOU LOCATED AND WHERE DO YOU SHIP? \u003c\/strong\u003e\u003c\/h4\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe Modern Furniture has two showrooms in Brisbane, Queensland, and one each in Bowral, New South Wales and Melbourne, Victoria. || 1; var params = { type: 'POST', url: '/cart/add.js', data: {'id': variant_id, 'quantity': quantity}, dataType: 'json', success: function(line_item) { Shopify.onItemAdded(line_item); this_is.text('Added'); let count = parseInt(jQuery('.cart-link__bubble .cart-link__bubble-num').text()); if(count == 0){ jQuery('.cart-link__bubble').addClass('cart-link__bubble--visible'); } jQuery('.cart-link__bubble.cart-link__bubble--visible .cart-link__bubble-num').text(count + 1) setTimeout(function(){this_is.text('Add To Cart')}, 1000) }, error: function(textStatus) { Shopify.onError( textStatus); this_is.text('Add To Cart') } }; jQuery.ajax(params); }; Shopify.onItemAdded = function(lineItem) { console.log(lineItem) jQuery('#CartCount').removeClass('hide critical-hidden'); jQuery.getJSON('/cart.js', function(cart) { jQuery('#CartCount span[data-cart-count]').text(cart.item_count); } ); }; Shopify.onError = function(error) { alert(error.responseJSON.description); } jQuery('.product-add-to-cart-wrap .add-to-cart-btn').on('click', function(){ let this_ = jQuery(this); let var_id = document.querySelector('.header-custom__help').classList.toggle('show'); }) const contactContainer = document.getElementById('help-header-container'); //a function that menu collapse on outside click outsideClick = (element, callback) => { var outsideClickListener = function (event) { const targetEl = document.querySelector('.header-custom__help.show'); if (!element.contains(event.target) && targetEl) { targetEl.classList.toggle('show'); callback(event); } else if (event.target.id === contactContainer.id && targetEl) { targetEl.classList.remove('show'); callback(event); } }; document.addEventListener('click', outsideClickListener); return outsideClickListener; } outsideClick(contactContainer, () => { document.getElementById('contact-container').classList.remove("show"); wishlistElement = document.querySelectorAll('.mega-menu-product-item .swym-button'); [...wishlistElement].forEach((element) => { const product_id = document.getElementById('product-id-wishlist-helper').textContent; const variant_id = document.getElementById('variant-id-wishlist-helper').textContent; const product_handle = document.getElementById('product-handle-wishlist-helper').textContent; const shop_url = document.getElementById('shop-url-wishlist-helper').textContent; element.classList.add(`product_${product_id}`); element.dataset.productId = product_id; element.dataset.variantId = variant_id; element.dataset.productUrl = `${shop_url}/products/${product_handle}`; }) } </script> <!-- Async load Help dropdown --> <script> let callUrl = "https:\/\/www.rjliving.com.au"; document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', (event) => { fetch(`${callUrl}?sections=contact`) .then((response) => {return response.json()}) .then((data) => { if (data["contact"] != null) { const desktopHelp = new DOMParser() .parseFromString(data["contact"], 'text/html') .querySelector("#contact-container--desktop"); class="mega-menu"> <div class="container"> <div class="row"> <div class="menu-desc-wrap"> <h2 class="menu-title">Planning</h2> <div class="menu-desc"><p>We match your needs with research-supported tools, techniques, and insights we&#39;ve developed over eight decades, applying our holistic understanding of the interplay between people, architecture and furniture, and the experiences they create.</p> </div> </div> <div class="third-level-menu" data-permissions='[0]'> <h5>Our Approach</h5> <ul> <li data-permissions='[0]'><a href='/story/design-plan/planning-with-knoll' setSiteCookie(cookieName, cookieValue, daysToExpire, path) { var cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue; if ((daysToExpire != null) && (daysToExpire != "") && (daysToExpire != "null") && (daysToExpire != "0")) { var expirationDate = new Date(); expirationDate.setDate(expirationDate.getDate() + daysToExpire); cookie += '; expires=' + expirationDate.toUTCString(); } if ((path != null) && (path != "") && (path != "null")) { cookie += '; path=' + path; } document.cookie = cookie; //window.console && console.log("In setSiteCookie, setting cookie = " + cookie); } function carousal --> <section id="right_sec"> <section class="product_showcase"> <div id="carousel1_slider"> <ul class="photo_showcase_slider" id="slider1"> <li> <a class="slider_img" href=" /designer/Florence-Knoll " > <img title="Florence Knoll" alt="Florence Knoll" src="/media/454/330/florence-knoll.jpg"> </a> <article class="slider_text"> <hgroup> <h3>Featured Designer</h3> <h1>Florence Knoll</h1> </hgroup> <p> &nbsp;</p> <p> In 1941 Florence Schust moved to New York after graduating from Cranbrook and working with many of the greatest architects in the world. &nbsp;There she met Hans Knoll, who was establishing a new furniture company. With Florence&rsquo;s design skills and Hans&rsquo; business acumen and salesmanship, the pair, who married in 1946, grew the nascent company into an international arbiter of style and design. Florence also seeded contributions with her friends Eero Saarinen, Harry Bertoia, and Mies van der Rohe.</p> <a href='/designer/Florence-Knoll'>read more</a> </article> </li> </ul> </div> </section> class="icon icon--picto-lock product-tabs__trust-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24"> <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12 17C13.1046 17 14 16.1046 14 15C14 13.8954 13.1046 13 12 13C10.8954 13 2 12 2C9.5 2 8 4 8 6C8 7.6 8 8 8 8M16 8H8" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path> </svg>Ways to Pay</button></div></collapsible-content> </div><div hidden id="block-template--22002755535155__product-content-d487a421-1be2-48aa-b0e0-c9fb08ed2b89" class="product-tabs__tab-item-wrapper" > <button is="toggle-button" class="collapsible-toggle heading heading--small hidden-lap-and-up" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="block-template--22002755535155__product-content-d487a421-1be2-48aa-b0e0-c9fb08ed2b89-content">Key Features - Mango Timber<svg focusable="false" width="12" height="8" class="icon icon--chevron " viewBox="0 0 12 8"> <path fill="none" d="M1 1l5 5 5-5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1"></path> </svg></button> <collapsible-content id="block-template--22002755535155__product-content-d487a421-1be2-48aa-b0e0-c9fb08ed2b89-content" class="collapsible"> <div class="product-tabs__tab-item-content rte"><meta charset="utf-8"> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;"><span>The timber used in this piece is sustainably sourced Mango Wood. Each plank is individually treated in a computer controlled kiln to reduce the chance of any cracks or warping in its long future as a furniture component.</span></span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">This piece has been handcrafted by one of our Vast Masters, these individual cabinet makers have been manufacturing Vast products for over a decade. Using traditional joinery techniques to maximise the timber's natural beauty is a big part of the unique look of each Vast product. We call this "working with the grain". After the joinery is complete it is then hand sanded and hand polished with several coats of high grade German lacquer so it will last for generations!</span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;"><strong>Country of Origin:</strong> India</span></p></div></collapsible-content> </div><div hidden id="block-template--22002755535155__product-content-c779f934-4b0a-4f4c-ae4f-565092f3acc7" class="product-tabs__tab-item-wrapper" > <button is="toggle-button" class="collapsible-toggle heading heading--small hidden-lap-and-up" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="block-template--22002755535155__product-content-c779f934-4b0a-4f4c-ae4f-565092f3acc7-content">Product Care - Timber<svg focusable="false" width="12" height="8" class="icon icon--chevron " viewBox="0 0 12 8"> <path fill="none" d="M1 1l5 5 5-5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1"></path> </svg></button> <collapsible-content id="block-template--22002755535155__product-content-c779f934-4b0a-4f4c-ae4f-565092f3acc7-content" class="collapsible"> <div class="product-tabs__tab-item-content rte"><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Hardwood is a natural material which reacts to its environment and although our manufacturing process allows for normal expansion and contraction, extreme high or low humidity may cause more swelling than normal. To minimise movement and ensure longevity of your purchase we recommend taking good care of your piece as outlined below: </span></p> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Dust regularly with a clean cotton cloth;</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Use tablecloths, table runners and coasters to help prevent scratches to the surface and wipe up any spills immediately; </span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">To nourish and protect your furniture we recommend waxing with a natural beeswax every 6-12 months. </span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Only use natural wax, oil or water based cleaning products. Do not use solvent based cleaning products that may contain silicone or alcohol, as this may react and permanently damage the lacquer.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Do not expose to fragrant oils, insect repellent lotion, or nail polish remover </span><span style="font-weight: 400;">as these are often solvent based and will damage the lacquer </span> </li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Avoid placing your furniture near fireplaces, in direct sunlight or under heating/cooling vents.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Do not leave hot items or ice cold items directly on the surface of the table as water marking may occur.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Any metal work featuring on your product has been powder coated. Any damage to the surface should be contained as soon as possible to prevent rusting.</span></li> </ul></div></collapsible-content> </div></div><div class="product-tabs__trust-list container hidden-lap-and-up"><button is="toggle-button" class="product-tabs__trust-title icon-text link text--subdued hidden-phone" Hudson String weave stool is made from native Sungkai wood. With its tapered legs, light colour and attractive grain, this handsome piece will set off your kitchen bench with style. The super comfy but lightweight weave for the seat, is a natural alternative to standard upholstery.</p> <p><strong>Dimensions &amp; Need to Know: </strong></p> <p><strong>Width 40cm Depth 37cm Height class="product-description rte" itemprop="description"> <p>Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Donna's Home Furnishings gift card.</p> <p>Gift cards are delivered to you, the purchaser, by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. To send a gift card to someone, just forward them the email.
